1.SceneDescription: The Hotel Lobby, Rachel and Phoebe are at the front desk checking out.

lines.Line: Listen y’know what sir? For the last time, I don’t care whatNEWLINEthe computer says, we did not take a bag of Mashuga nuts from the mini-bar and we did notNEWLINEwatch Dr. Do-Me-A-Little
Oh! Joey uh, were you in our room last night
No. (Phoebe grabs the receipt and shows it to Joey who gets mad.) I wasNEWLINEtold the name of the movie would not appear on the bill
(to the front desk clerk) Hi! We’re checking out of the bridalNEWLINEsuite
(depressed) That’s right. I’m no longer a bride. I’llNEWLINEnever be a bride again. Now, I’m just someone’s wife
And I’m the happiest guy in the world! (Monica goes and sits downNEWLINEin a huff.) Oh honey, come on don’t be upset. We still have so much to look forwardNEWLINEto
They won’t be ready for weeks
Not the disposable cameras from the tables
Not the disposable cameras from the tables
That’s true! (Happily) I knew I married you for a reason
I’ll tell you what, I will go get them developed and you can goNEWLINEhome
What? What did you take a picture of
Okay Ross has the cameras, has he checked out yet
Okay Ross has the cameras, has he checked out yet
Are you joking? Check out is not ‘til noon and he has a goodNEWLINE(checks her watch) eleven minutes left
Ross has never checked out of a room a minute before he had to
Yeah, one time, when we were dating, uh we got a late checkout, he gotNEWLINEso excited it was the best sex we ever had. Until y’know, he screamed out RadissonNEWLINEat the end
Okay, well I’m gonna get Ross, get the cameras, and get themNEWLINEdeveloped. (Joey laughs again.) 32 Joe. You’re 32! (Exits
(To Monica) Here’s a copy of your bill
(To Monica) Here’s a copy of your bill
(To Monica) Here’s a copy of your bill
Oh thanks. (Reading the bill) Champagne, strawberries…Oh my God! INEWLINEcan’t believe Chandler ordered porn on our wedding night

2.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Phoebe is entering to see Monica sitting in front of aNEWLINEmound of wedding gifts.

lines.Line: Are you gonna open the presents without Chandler

No! (Pause) But, they’re callin’ out to me! I mean this littleNEWLINEguy (Holds up a small one) even crawled up into my lap. Oh come on, Chandler wouldn’tNEWLINEmind if I opened just one present! What do you think it is
A little mirror that when you look into it you see yourself as an oldNEWLINEwoman
A little mirror that when you look into it you see yourself as an oldNEWLINEwoman
Ohhh! My God! For tiny salt
Oh wow! Okay. Well that was fun
Oh wow! Okay. Well that was fun
Good. Okay, I’m just gonna wait for Chandler to open the rest ofNEWLINEthem
Whew. Although y’know, this is part of a salt and pepper set. INEWLINEmean… I guess y’know it may just count as a half a present. What do you think
Well I guess it’s okay to open one more if it’s part of a set.NEWLINEY’know, it’s probably this one. (Grabs another small one.
Or this one! (She grabs and starts to open the biggest present.
Or this one! (She grabs and starts to open the biggest present.
Hey, how are you feelin’? Any morning sickness
Shh-shh-shh! The guys don’t know yet do they
Shh-shh-shh! The guys don’t know yet do they
No! Joey and Ross don’t know anything and Chandler still thinksNEWLINEthat Phoebe’s pregnant

Yeah that’s right Chandler does still think I’m pregnant. HeNEWLINEhasn’t asked me how I’m feeling or offered to carry my bags. Boy, I feel bad forNEWLINEthe woman who ends up with him. (Monica looks at her.) After you of course
Don’t worry I promise that you will only have to be pregnant for aNEWLINEfew more hours, ‘cause I’m going to tell the father today
Ooh, is it someone in this building? Is it that tall guy from the firstNEWLINEfloor
Ooh, is it someone in this building? Is it that tall guy from the firstNEWLINEfloor
Well then you have his baby
Wow. Y’know it is so weird. I mean, you’re gonna tell this guyNEWLINEtoday and he has no idea what’s gonna happen
Yeah. You’re just gonna knock on his door and change his lifeNEWLINEforever. You’re like Ed McMahon except without the big check, or the raw sexualNEWLINEmagnetism
Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news
Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news

Pretty big? It’s huge! God, this guy doesn’t have a clue!NEWLINEHe’s just walking down the street thinking, ‘I had sex with Rachel Green. INEWLINErock!’ then bam! He’s a father and everything’s different
Well it’s only different if he wants it to be. I mean, I’m notNEWLINEgonna ask him for anything
Okay. Then he still has this huge decision to make. Now he’sNEWLINEwalking around thinking, ‘Do I want to be a dad?’ and then bam
I don’t. He got…he-he-he-he’s hit by a bus
Hey Joey, what would you do if someone that you slept with told you thatNEWLINEshe was pregnant
(warily) Who called here? Did she sound blond? Huh? Did-did-did she haveNEWLINEan accent? I gotta make a call! (Starts to leave) I shoulda never walked into thatNEWLINESunglass Hut
Oh Joey! Joey! No, it’s not you! You didn’t get anybodyNEWLINEpregnant
Oh Joey! Joey! No, it’s not you! You didn’t get anybodyNEWLINEpregnant
Oh. Why would you scare me like that? What the hell is going on? (Pause.)NEWLINEIs somebody pregnant
Oh my God Pheebs! You’re gonna have a baby
Oh my God Pheebs! You’re gonna have a baby
Yes. Yes I am. Oh my God, I’m gonna have a baby! (Joey and PhoebeNEWLINEhug.
Whoa, wait a minute. Who’s the father
Whoa, wait a minute. Who’s the father
You don’t know him. It’s not important. He wants nothing to doNEWLINEwith me or the baby. (She sits down like she’s pregnant.
Well who is this guy?! Huh? Who is he? ‘Cause I will track him downNEWLINEand kick his ass
David Lynn! David Lynn! David Lynn!! (Exits
Oh some guy from my gym. A little annoying
Oh some guy from my gym. A little annoying

lines.Line: Hey! Ooh, did you do it yet

No, you! Phoebe you freaked me out. You kept saying how huge this allNEWLINEis
I know, but I was just thinking about how huge this is for me. INEWLINEdidn’t even go to how huge this was going to be for the father

You’re thinking about this way too much. Just tell him and get itNEWLINEover with. It’s like, it’s like ripping off this Band-Aid. (On her arm) QuickNEWLINEand painless, watch. (Rips it off.) Oh mother of…See

5.SceneDescription: The Banquet Room, Ross is taking a picture of a plant, Chandler a fork. TheNEWLINEband stops.

lines.Line: Why don’t you go up on stage. I’ll get a picture of youNEWLINEdoing the speech

lines.Character: (He goes up on stage, mimes like he's giving the speech, and Chandler takes hisNEWLINEpicture. However, before he gets down everyone starts clinking their glasses for a realNEWLINEspeech
lines.Line: He goes up on stage, mimes like he's giving the speech, and Chandler takes hisNEWLINEpicture. However, before he gets down everyone starts clinking their glasses for a realNEWLINEspeech.

Get ready to run. (Chandler walks over to the new bride.)NEWLINECongratulations on your wedding. (He grabs her, kisses her, Ross takes the picture, andNEWLINEthey both run out.

6.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Obsessive Monica has finished opening all the presents.NEWLINEShe’s ashamed of this, at least, because as someone enters…

lines.Line: (throwing up the last present) I don’t know how any of these gotNEWLINEopened?
I know! I know! I am a terrible person! I mean, Chandler is never goingNEWLINEto trust me with anything ever again

Well, I don’t know. I think it does something to salami

Listen I uh… (He takes her hand.) It’s a scary world out thereNEWLINEespecially if you’re a single mom. Y’know, I always felt like you and I haveNEWLINEthis-this special bond. Y’know? So, (gets down on one knee again) Rachel Green willNEWLINEyou marry me
Pheebs, give me the ring back
Pheebs, give me the ring back
No! Joey, oh you’re so sweet. You’re so-so sweet, honey. ButNEWLINEI’m not, I’m not looking for a husband
Now, if you will excuse me I am going to go and lie down. (Exits.
I can’t say that didn’t hurt. But I’ll take you back JoeyNEWLINETribbiani
Uh yeah. Pheebs, listen about that. I only offered

lines.Character: (Chandler and Ross enter with the new pictures

So we don’t need—(Rips the picture)—There’s noNEWLINEneed to have this picture. How about I take the real pictures and get them developed rightNEWLINEnow
